title: Bobcat who was injured as a kitten and lost all his survival instincts gets rescued, and his caretakers find out that his favorite toy is fennel: 'It knocked most of the... "bobcat" out of him'
description: All big cats are amazing and meowgestic, but unfortunately, not every one of them gets the same start at life. Some are a little less lucky than others, but that doesn't mean that they cannot find their joy in life. And when things like that happen - when a big cat, for whatever reason, cannot be released back into the wild, it is up to us humans to make its life as good as it can be. For some big cats, it's just about making a friend - like this shy rescued cheetah cub who got paired up with a puppy or this rescued black panther who grew up with a Rottweiler. For others, it's about finding a new purpose - like this injured bobcat who became the best foster momma to other orphaned cubs. And for T'Challa, the bobcat we're going to be talking about today, who fell on its head as a kitten after a hawk grabbed it, finding joy in life just meant discovering that fennel is the best toy ever.
author: Mariel Ruvinsky
excerpt: Bobcat who was injured as a kitten and lost all his survival instincts gets rescued, and his caretakers find out that his favorite toy is fennel: 'It knocked most of the... "bobcat" out of him' - World's largest collection of cat memes and other animals
text: We do not think that it is possible for us to love an animal more than we have fallen in love with this little guy. Thank you for saving him. Thank you for giving him a second chance and for taking care of him so diligently. And thank you for giving him all the fennel that he could possibly want.  Not everyone has a great start in life, but we think that if there is anything that this story has reminded us of, it is that everyone - truly everyone - deserves a chance. Being different doesn't mean that you deserve love any less than someone who is “normal”.
html:
We do not think that it is possible for us to love an animal more than we have fallen in love with this little guy. Thank you for saving him. Thank you for giving him a second chance and for taking care of him so diligently. And thank you for giving him all the fennel that he could possibly want. 

Not everyone has a great start in life, but we think that if there is anything that this story has reminded us of, it is that everyone - truly everyone - deserves a chance. Being different doesn't mean that you deserve love any less than someone who is “normal”.
